info.name: Ultimate MCP Server ‚Äî All 103 Tools
info.description:
Complete collection for the Ultimate All-in-One MCP Server with 103 tools across 7 categories.

## Setup
1. Import this collection
2. Import the `MCP_Environment.json` environment file
3. Set your `BASE_URL` in the environment
4. Run any request!

## Categories
- üìù Text & Content (20 tools)
- üî¢ Data & Math (15 tools)
- üåê Web & Research (12 tools)
- üìÖ Date & Time (10 tools)
- üíº Business & Finance (12 tools)
- üíª Developer Tools (11 tools)
- ü§ñ AI Prompts & Templates (10 tools)

variable.description: Your Vercel deployment URL ‚Äî change this!

request.description: Check if the MCP server is running and healthy.
Returns all 103 tools grouped by category.
The HTML landing page of the MCP server.
Initialize the MCP connection. Returns server info and capabilities.
List all available tools via the MCP protocol.
Summarize long text into key sentences. Change max_sentences to control output length.
Count words, characters, sentences, paragraphs, reading time, speaking time.
Extract all unique email addresses from any text.
Extract all URLs from any text or HTML content.
Extract all phone numbers in various formats from text.
Convert any text into a URL-friendly slug.
Convert text between: upper, lower, title, camel, snake, kebab, pascal, sentence
Find and replace text with optional regex support.
Compare two texts and find added/removed lines with similarity score.
Truncate text to a max length, breaking on word boundaries.
Generate Lorem Ipsum placeholder text for mockups.
Check if text reads the same forwards and backwards.
Advanced text stats: top words, word frequency, lexical diversity, longest word.
Validate email format and extract local part and domain.
Validate and parse a URL into all its components.
Encode or decode: encode_base64, decode_base64, encode_uri, decode_uri, encode_html, decode_html
Generate secure random passwords. Adjust length and character types.
Generate creative username suggestions from a name or keyword.
Get Flesch-Kincaid readability score and grade level.
Check if two words are anagrams of each other.
Evaluate math expressions safely. Supports +, -, *, /, %, parentheses.
Convert units. Categories: length, weight, temperature, area, volume, speed
Operations: percent_of, what_percent, percent_change, add_percent, subtract_percent
Get mean, median, mode, std deviation, variance, min, max, quartiles.
Check if a number is prime and get all its factors.
Generate Fibonacci sequence up to 50 terms.
Calculate BMI, category, and ideal weight range.
Calculate compound interest with yearly breakdown.
Calculate monthly loan payment and total interest.
Convert between 30 major currencies. Codes: USD, EUR, GBP, INR, JPY, AED, etc.
Convert integers to Roman numerals or vice versa. Set to: roman or integer
Format numbers. Options: commas, scientific, binary, hex, octal, words
Calculate tip and split the bill among any number of people.
Add or remove tax from an amount. tax_type: add_tax or remove_tax
Calculate exact age and days until next birthday.
Generate complete SEO meta tags including Open Graph and Twitter Cards.
Generate robots.txt with custom rules, sitemap and crawl delay.
Look up the meaning of any HTTP status code.
Convert colors between HEX, RGB, and HSL formats.
Generate a QR code image URL for any text or URL.
Validate, parse, and extract values from JSON using dot notation path.
Convert a JSON array to CSV format for Excel/Sheets.
Convert CSV data to a JSON array.
Convert Markdown to HTML including headings, bold, italic, links, lists.
Strip all HTML tags and return clean plain text.
Generate an XML sitemap for a website.
Detect browser, OS, device type and bot status from User-Agent string.
Format dates. Options: iso, us, eu, long, short, unix, relative, custom
Calculate exact difference between two dates in days, weeks, months, years.
Add or subtract time. Units: seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, years
Count Mon-Fri business days between two dates.
Convert time between any IANA timezones. Use 'now' for current time.
Get days, hours, minutes, seconds until any future date.
Generate a text calendar for any month and year.
Convert between Unix timestamps and human dates. Set to: timestamp or date
Get the week number and day of year for any date.
Check if a date is a US Federal holiday.
Generate structured invoice data with line items, tax, and totals.
Calculate gross margin, net margin, markup, and ROI.
Analyze income vs expenses with breakdown and savings rate.
Calculate Net Present Value of an investment with cash flows.
Find units needed to break even and contribution margin.
Convert any salary frequency. From: hourly, daily, weekly, biweekly, monthly, annually
Calculate stock trade ROI including commissions and dividends.
Create budget using 50-30-20, 70-20-10, or custom split rules.
Calculate ARPU, churn rate, CAC, LTV, LTV:CAC ratio, resolution rate.
Generate an 8-section business plan outline for any industry.
Generate a SWOT analysis template with guided prompts for each quadrant.
Calculate ROI, annualized return, profit and payback period.
Generate 1-50 UUID v4 values in a single call.
Generate hash checksums. Algorithms: simple32, djb2, sdbm, adler32
Get regex for: email, phone_us, url, ip_address, credit_card, zip_code, date_us, date_iso, hex_color, username, strong_password, ssn, mac_address
Analyze cyclomatic complexity, line counts, and function count.
Scaffold all 6 REST endpoints (GET list, POST, GET one, PUT, PATCH, DELETE).
Build SQL queries. Types: select, insert, update, delete, create_table
Generate realistic mock data. Types: users, products, orders, companies, addresses
Generate palettes. Types: monochromatic, complementary, triadic, analogous
Parse any cron expression into human-readable format.
Generate conventional commit messages. Types: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, test, chore, perf, ci, build
Generate a .env file template with comments and required flags.
Generate a complete system prompt for any AI assistant role.
Wrap any problem in a step-by-step reasoning prompt template.
Build a few-shot prompt with examples for consistent AI outputs.
Types: welcome, follow_up, cold_outreach, apology, rejection, proposal, invoice_reminder, thank_you, announcement
Generate a complete job description with requirements, responsibilities, and benefits.
Types: team_standup, project_kickoff, retrospective, planning, all_hands, one_on_one, custom
Generate Agile user stories with acceptance criteria and definition of done.
Generate a full OKR framework with objective and measurable key results.
Generate a weekly social media content calendar with post ideas and best times.
Generate a professional press release template ready to customize.
